Title: Final Destination 3
Writer: Glen Morgan, James Wong, Jeffrey Reddick (characters)
Actors: Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Ryan Merriman, Kris Lemche, Alexz Johnson
Plot: Six years after students cheated death, another teen has a premonition she and her friends will be involved in an accident. When the vision proves true, the student and survivors deal with the repercussions of cheating the Grim Reaper.
